## Query.deleteOne() method

Based on the query, first matched document will be deleted

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteOne(query: QueryExecutorDeleteQuery, options?: QueryDeleteOneOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

query


</td><td>

QueryExecutorDeleteQuery


</td><td>

Delete query to match documents


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

QueryDeleteOneOptions


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Remarks

This is similar to calling the `deleteMany` with `deleteLimit = 1` option

## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.deleteOne({ $key: key }, options);
```
